summary:
ABOND Migration is Live! - A New Era Is ComingIntroducing ApeBond. Migrate to $ABOND and get special bonuses by locking your tokens longer.

 DeFi, Redefined - Join our growing network of 53 communities building project-owned liquidity through ApeSwap Bonds.

 BONDS AVAILABLE ON - Discover New Opportunities
proposal:
Hello ApeBond enthusiasts, 🦍

They say the early bird catches the worm, but in our case, the early ape catches the $ABOND! 🍌

We're here to introduce a suite of B2B tools that align perfectly with the vision of ApeBond. We're not just about offering tools, we're about empowering communities like yours, and we've got quite the toolkit for your project.

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY) - Why swing from tree to tree when you can have your own DEX based on Uniswap V2? Customize it to your liking, and set your own commission. 

2. 🎰 Lottery - Who doesn't love a good lottery? Especially when it's blockchain-based and supports ETH, BSC, Polygon. 

3. 🪙 Wallet - Keep your $ABOND safe and sound in a multicurrency crypto wallet that you can customize. 

4. 🌾 Farming - With our staking & yield farming tool, you can attract more investment by offering rewards. 

5. 🗳 DAO - Make your community's voice heard with governance and proposals tool for your crypto token. 

6. 🌉 CrossChain - Swing across blockchains with ease with our EVM compatible blockchain bridge. 

7. 🚀 IDOFactory - Launchpad - Launch your IDO pools and lock tokens with our Launchpad solution. 

Remember, it's all B2B, so you're not just playing, you're creating. Interested? Check out https://t.me/onoutdemos. Let's redefine DeFi together, one $ABOND at a time! 🦍🍌👋
